name: antique mason coffee jar with EcoJarz stainless steel lid
description:
We have decided to go with our love of antiques with these drinking jars. The jars we are selling are the coffee jars in the picture with the square pattern on the outside. We have found these jars are easier to hold than the standard, round quart jars. The jars are antiques and therefore not new, but they have been carefully inspected and are in wonderful shape.

The EcoJarz lids are stainless steel with a silicone gasket. They fit on top of the jar, and use a regular mason jar ring to secure them in place. We use them as our drinking jars, and they are just wonderful!

This product does not come with the stainless steel straw at this time.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: standard size organic buckwheat hull pillow with hemp liner
description:
We offer a 15% discount when two pillows are ordered, and free shipping on orders over $99.

Our standard size pillows do not come with a pillow case at this time, but we will have that option in the future. If you would like to custom order a pillowcase now, please contact us.

Our buckwheat hulls are organic, and grown right here in the midwest.

The liner is made of 100% hemp, which is an eco friendly crop that does not require herbicides, pesticides or irrigation. Our hemp fabric is certified as a sustainable and biodegradable product.

We always encourage our customers to do some research on their own to learn about hemp and buckwheat hull pillows. We believe this pillow will be one of the best investments you can make for yourself and a restful nights sleep.

Please visit our resources page for useful links to learn more about hemp and buckwheat and other topics

While our pillows are sewn and stored in a clean, pet-free studio, we do have dogs in our home.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: travel size organic buckwheat hull pillow with hemp liner and pillow case
description:
These pillows are actually made and ready to go, but we are working on a pillowcase that we will sell with the pillows since they are smaller and will not fit a standard pillowcase. The pillowcases will be made with our hemp and hemp/organic cotton blends.

These pillows are 12x20 and are filled with about 3lbs of hulls. They are perfect for taking along with you any where you go, or for using as your every night pillow.

If you would like to purchase one of these pillows without a pillowcase now, please contact us. Otherwise, our goal is to have the pillowcases ready by the middle of October.

The buckwheat hulls are organic and the hemp liner is certified sustainable and biodegradable.

Please visit our resources page for useful links to learn more about hemp and buckwheat and other topics.

While our pillows are sewn and stored in a clean, pet-free studio, we do have dogs in our home.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: 100% hemp exfoliating washcloth
description:
We are so proud of these 100% hemp washcloths. They were created with a purpose, and to make a statement. The fact that they are an also an amazing product, just makes them even more special!

For you, we chose this 100% hemp fabric for it's durability, exfoliating properties and natural antimicrobial properties.

For our planet, we chose this 100% hemp because it is grown without the need for harmful herbicides and pesticides, it does not require irrigation, and it has many sustainable uses.

This fabric is a certified sustainable and biodegradable product.

The color of the loop on these washcloths may vary depending on the fabric we have on hand. We make use of every scrap of fabric that we can so we use a variety of colors of our hemp and hemp/organic cotton blends.

We support the legalization of industrial hemp in the United States. Visit votehemp.com to learn more about this important issue.

While our pillows are sewn and stored in a clean, pet-free studio, we do have dogs in our home.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: handmade bamboo washcloth
description:
We offer a discount when ordering multiple washcloths. Click on the drop down box for discount pricing.

We think these wash cloths are exquisite. They are handmade in Sandy's studio at Tamarack Farm. They measure 12x12 and are triple stitched around the edges.

This fabric is 70% bamboo, 28% organic cotton and 2% polyester

The fabric is certified Oeko-Tex Standard 100, which ensures it has been tested and is free of harmful chemicals.

While our washcloths are sewn and stored in a clean, pet-free studio, we do have dogs in our home.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: cedar soap dish
description:
These red cedar soap dishes are designed and created by Sarah and her husband Aaron. They are fully finished and soaked two times in raw linseed oil, then left to dry in ambient sunlight until they dry with a nice, protective finish.

This Ra Linolja (raw linseed oil) is cold pressed and comes straight from Sweden.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: gift sets
description:
Gift sets come with a cedar soap dish, bamboo washcloth, and your choice of organic goat's milk soap. We dress them up similar to what you see here with a hemp ribbon or cloth.

To see how the soap dishes and washcloths are made, visit the individual pages for those items at cedar soap dish and bamboo washcloths

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: personal size soaps
description:
So, we know that sometimes you get that never ending bar of soap on the bathroom or kitchen sink that gets used over and over for many months, and eventually you just have to throw half a bar away and replace it. We get it!

What we have here is a bag of .25 ounce pieces of cut soap that you can pack when you are out and about (so you know whats in the soap you are washing with), when you are traveling, or for the kitchen or bathroom sink.

These pieces can still last awhile, but it won't be for many months, and you can just replace them as needed!

These soaps qualify for the 20% discount on 3 or more soaps and shampoos by using the discount code ORGANICSUDS.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: springtime goat's milk soap
description:
We created this soap with springtime in mind. We wanted a bar that was fresh and light; that would appeal to anyone. The blend of Ho Wood, Amyris and Lavender together with our fresh, organic oils and goat’s milk gives us that happy feeling that you only get from a warm and sunny spring day.

Ingredients

* signifies an organic ingredient

fresh goat's milk, saponified oils of [*olive oil, *coconut oil, *safflower oil, *cocoa butter, *castor oil] NaOh, *ho wood, *amyris, and *lavender essentil oils

This soap is hand cut and each bar weighs approximately 3.5-4 ounces.

We use only fresh, organic oils from our trusted suppliers, and the nigerian dwarf goat's milk from Tamarack Farm. Our soap packaging is 100% post consumer waste.

We are completely committed to creating products that are good for both us and our planet.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: simply unscented goat's milk soap
description:
This soap is difficult to describe because the only thing different about it is that we didn't include any essential oils. It still contains our signature formulation and our fresh, organic oils and goat's milk. All of our soaps are gentle and organic, and wonderful for sensitive skin. But this soap is just simply - unscented.

Ingredients

* signifies an organic ingredient

fresh goat's milk, saponified oils of [*olive oil, *coconut oil, *safflower oil, *cocoa butter, *castor oil] NaOh

This soap is hand cut and each bar weighs approximately 3.5-4 ounces.

We use only fresh, organic oils from our trusted suppliers, and the nigerian dwarf goat's milk from Tamarack Farm. Our soap packaging is 100% post consumer waste.

We are completely committed to creating products that are good for both us and our planet.

RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: milk, oats & honey goat's milk soap
description:
Milk, Oats & Honey is unscented to preserve the unique, natural aroma of the finished soap with the organic oats and honey. The oats are finely ground to give the bar a bit of exfoliation that feels wonderful on the skin.

Ingredients

* signifies an organic ingredient

fresh goat's milk, saponified oils of [*olive oil, *coconut oil, *safflower oil, *cocoa butter, *castor oil] NaOh, *finely ground rolled oats, honey

This soap is hand cut and each bar weighs approximately 3.5-4 ounces.

We use only fresh, organic oils from our trusted suppliers, and the nigerian dwarf goat's milk from Tamarack Farm. Our soap packaging is 100% post consumer waste.

name: harmony goat's milk soap
description:
We call this bar Organic Harmony because the combination of Lavender, Sweet Orange and Spearmint reminds us of three very different, but beautiful voices singing in perfect harmony.

fresh goat's milk, saponified oils of [*coconut oil, *olive oil, *safflower oil, *castor oil, *cocoa butter, *shea butter] NaOh, *lavender, *spearmint, and *sweet orange essential oils

name: cedar grove goat's milk soap
description:
With the woodsy base notes of Amyris, Peru Balsam and Cedarwood, this soap was initially intended for our more masculine customers. However, much to our delighted surprise, the scent is proving to be appealing to anyone. We think the blend is fresh and invigorating.

fresh goat's milk, saponified oils of [*olive oil, *coconut oil, *safflower oil, *cocoa butter, *castor oil] NaOh, *amyris, *peru balsam, and *cedarwood essential oils

name: rosemary mint goat's milk soap
description:
The combination of stimulating Rosemary and refreshing Spearmint create the perfect mix for your morning shower wake up call. There is a reason why Rosemary and mint are such a popular blend - because they just mingle!

Ingredients

* signifies an organic ingredient

fresh goat's milk, saponified oils of [*olive oil, *coconut oil, *safflower oil, *cocoa butter, *castor oil] NaOh, *rosemary and *spearmint essential oils

name: tea tree mint shampoo
description:
This shampoo bar has a blend of Tea Tree, Niaouli, and Spearmint, and is suitable for all hair types and colors. Tea Tree oil is widely known for it's skin healing properties and is a great oil for keeping our scalps healthy.

Ingredients

* signifies an organic ingredient

fresh goat's milk, saponified oils of [*coconut, *olive, *castor, *cocoa butter, *avocado, *shea butter, *jojoba] NaOh, *tea tree, *niaouli, *spearmint essential oils

These shampoo bars are approximately 3.5-4 ounces, and are proven to last 45-50 washes, and easily more if you have short hair.

We'd like to share a some feel good facts about shampoo bars that you may not know:

  • When you use a shampoo bar, you are eliminating the preservatives and chemicals that are so heavy in shampoos and conditioners. These chemicals can actually enter your body through your skin while you are showering, and they also go down the drain and end up in our water supply.
  • A shampoo bar is used until it's gone. No plastic bottle!
  • What does this mean? It means essentially that you can make your shower plastic and chemical free by using shampoo bars and bar soap.
  • And as if that wasn't enough, you will also be happy to know that these bars are formulated to be extra conditioning, so conditioner is completely optional!


RETURN TO HOME PAGE

name: harmony shampoo
description:
This shampoo bar has the same blend of essential oils as our Harmony soap bar. We enjoy the blend so much that we think it makes a perfect addition to our selection of shampoo bars. So, now you can shampoo in harmony too!

Ingredients

* signifies an organic ingredient

fresh goat's milk, water, saponified oils of [*coconut, *castor, *olive, *cocoa butter, *avocado, *shea butter, *jojoba] NaOh, *lavender, *spearmint and *sweet orange essential oils

These shampoo bars are approximately 3.5-4 ounces, and are proven to last 45-50 washes, and easily more if you have short hair.

name: milk and kaffe shampoo
description:
We used the Swedish word "kaffe" in this bar in honor of our Scandinavian heritage. In Sweden there is a custom of gathering with good friends to visit and drink kaffe and nibble on some sweet treats. It's called Fika. While this shampoo doesn't come with swedish steaming hot kaffe and a snack, we hope you enjoy the experience of washing your hair with this special bar, and consider it your own daily Fika.

Ingredients

* signifies an organic ingredient

fresh goat's milk, water, saponified oils of [*coconut, *castor, *olive, *cocoa butter, *avocado, *shea butter, *jojoba] NaOh, *ground arabica swedish blend coffee beans

These shampoo bars are approximately 3.5-4 ounces, and are proven to last 45-50 washes, and easily more if you have short hair.

We'd like to share a some feel good facts about shampoo bars that you may not know:

  • When you use a shampoo bar, you are eliminating the preservatives and chemicals that are so heavy in shampoos and conditioners. These chemicals can actually enter your body through your skin while you are showering, and they also go down the drain and end up in our water supply.

  • What does this mean? It means essentially that you can make your shower plastic and chemical free by using shampoo bars and bar soap.
  • And as if that wasn't enough, you will also be happy to know that these bars are formulated to be extra conditioning, so conditioner is completely optional!
